job.remarks: 1. Generate sales orders in 400 for purchase orders in 484 for Orlaco Products 2. Generate purchase orders in 484 for sales invoices created in 400 for Orlaco Inc.

step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] ( [purchase_ordernr] ,[runid] ,[rowstatus] ,[rowmessage] ,[retrycounter] ,[sysmodified] ,[syscreated] )
SELECT [H].ordernr AS [purchase_ordernr] , '%runid%' AS [runid] , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] ) < 1 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS [rowstatus] ,'' As [rowmessage] ,0 AS [retrycounter] ,getdate() ,getdate()
FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orkrg AS [H] with (nolock) -- 184 WHERE 1=1 AND [H].ord_soort = 'B' AND [H].crdnr = 151048 AND [H].fiattering = 'J' AND [H].ordbv_afgd = 1 AND [H].afgehandld = 0 and ISNULL([H].refer,'') not like 'Transfer USA%' -- voorkom dat null problemen geeft and [H].syscreated > dateadd(day,-5,getdate()) -- voor de snelheid
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [T] WHERE [T].purchase_ordernr = [H].ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_TransfersOrders] AS [T] WHERE [T].purchase_ordernr = [H].ordernr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ) AND not exists (select 1 from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orkrg AS T with (nolock) where 1=1 and t.ord_soort = 'V' and T.docnumber LIKE '%' + [H].ordernr + '%') -- 100
--and ordernr = '62257005'
step.stepname: ... Nieuwe te verwerken inkooporders in x84 [184:100]

step.datasource:
SELECT [H].ordernr as HeaderID ,997354 as debnr ,[H].orddat ,[H].afldat ,[H].ordernr as docnumber ,[H].refer as refer
,CONCAT('513/130/H/', LTRIM(RTRIM([H].ordernr)) ) AS [referkey]
FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[DBO].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [S] WITH(nolock) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orkrg AS [H] with (nolock) ON [H].[ordernr] = [S].[purchase_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT WHERE 1=1
AND [S].[rowstatus] = 1 AND [S].[runid] = '%runid%'

SELECT [H].ordernr as HeaderID ,[L].artcode ,[L].esr_aantal ,CASE WHEN artcode is null then null ELSE 'ICL' END AS Prijslijst ,[L].afldat ,'ADDNEW' as action ,CONCAT('513/130/L/', LTRIM(RTRIM([H].ordernr)) ) AS [referkey]
FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[DBO].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [S] WITH(nolock) INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orkrg AS [H] with (nolock) ON [H].[ordernr] = [S].[purchase_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orsrg AS [L] with (nolock) on [L].ordernr = [H].ordernr
WHERE 1=1
AND [S].[rowstatus] = 1 AND [S].[runid] = '%runid%'

UPDATE [S] SET [rowstatus] = ISNULL([OA_ER].rowstatus,-1) ,[rowmessage] = ISNULL([OA_ER].errormessage,'Onbekende fout') ,[sysmodified] = getdate() ,[sales_ordernr] = ISNULL([OA_ER].NewKeyvalue,'') --,[rowstatus1] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([OA_ER].rowstatus,-1) = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END --,[runid1] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([OA_ER].rowstatus,-1) = 2 THEN [S].[runid] ELSE NULL END
FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [S]
OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP (1) [R].rowstatus ,[R].NewKeyvalue ,[R].errormessage FROM [%abeidb%].[DBO].[_AB_Entity_results] AS [R] WITH(nolock) WHERE 1 = 1 AND [R].Entity = 'SalesOrderHeader' AND [R].Action = 'create' AND [R].runid = [S].[runid] AND [R].ReferenceValue = CONCAT('513/130/H/', LTRIM(RTRIM([S].purchase_ordernr ))COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT ) ) AS [OA_ER]
WHERE 1 = 1 AND [S].[rowstatus] = 1 AND [S].[runid] = '%runid%'

step.stepname: TABEL Order_Invoice_Sync VULLEN MET OVERIGE DATA

step.datasource:
INSERT INTO [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] ( [purchase_ordernr] ,[sales_ordernr] ,[runid] ,[rowstatus] ,[rowmessage] ,[retrycounter] ,[sysmodified] ,[syscreated] )
SELECT TOP 1000 [BH].[ordernr] AS [purchase_ordernr] ,[SH].[ordernr] AS [sales_ordernr] ,'%runid%' AS [runid] , 3 AS [rowstatus] , 'Manual created' AS [rowmessage] , 0 AS [retrycounter] , GETDATE() AS [sysmodified] , GETDATE() AS [syscreated]
FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[orkrg] AS [SH] WITH(nolock) -- 100 INNER JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[orkrg] AS [BH] WITH(nolock) ON [SH].docnumber LIKE '%' + [BH].ordernr + '%' COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- 184 where 1 = 1 and [SH].debnr = '997354' and [SH].afgehandld = 1 and datediff(day, [SH].sysmodified, getdate() ) = 0
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [T] WHERE [T].purchase_ordernr = [BH].[ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )

INSERT INTO [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] ( [purchase_ordernr] ,[sales_ordernr] ,[runid] ,[rowstatus] ,[rowmessage] ,[retrycounter] ,[sysmodified] ,[syscreated]
)
SELECT TOP 1000 [BH].[ordernr] AS [purchase_ordernr] ,[SH].[ordernr] AS [sales_ordernr] ,'%runid%' AS [runid] , 13 AS [rowstatus] -- Niet verder oppakken of verwerken , 'Purchase order not found' AS [rowmessage] , 0 AS [retrycounter] , GETDATE() AS [sysmodified] , GETDATE() AS [syscreated]
FROM [%abeitargetdb%].[dbo].[orkrg] AS [SH] WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[orkrg] AS [BH] WITH(nolock) ON [SH].docnumber LIKE '%' + [BH].ordernr + '%' COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT where 1 = 1 and [SH].debnr = '997354' and [SH].afgehandld = 1 AND [BH].[ordernr] IS NULL and datediff(day, [SH].sysmodified, getdate() ) = 0
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [T] WHERE [T].sales_ordernr = [SH].[ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )

SELECT TOP 1000 [S].[purchase_ordernr] AS [purchase_ordernr] ,[S].[sales_ordernr] AS [sales_ordernr] ,[S].[rowmessage] AS [message] ,GETDATE() AS [syscreated] ,[SalesB].[Document] ,[SalesB].[Filename]
FROM [ABSC_Data].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [S] WITH(nolock) LEFT JOIN [%abeisourcedb%].[dbo].[BacoDiscussions] AS [SalesB] WITH(nolock) ON [SalesB].OrderNumber = [S].[sales_ordernr] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT and type = 14
WHERE 1 = 1 AND [S].[rowstatus] = 13 AND [S].runid = '%runid%'
order by [S].sysmodified desc
step.contentbody:
Geachte lezer,

Voor de onderstaande verkooporders zijn  geen gerelateerde inkooporders gevonden. De inkooporders zullen nog moeten worden aangemaakt:







purchase_ordernrsales_ordernrmessagesyscreated
%purchase_ordernr%%sales_ordernr%%message%%syscreated%
 



Met vriendelijke groet,

De ABEI mailer

Basis gegevens:
RunID: %runid%
Tijd: %abei_now_121%
Server: %abeiserver% \ %jobid% \ %jobstepid%
step.stepname: ... Stuur mail met verkooporders zonder inkooporder [100:mail]

step.datasource:
SELECT TOP 1000 [SH].[purchase_ordernr] AS [purchase_ordernr] ,[SH].[sales_ordernr] AS [sales_ordernr] , [SH].[rowmessage] AS [message] , GETDATE() AS [syscreated]
FROM [%prm_ABSC_Data%].[dbo].[_AB_tb_ABEI_Order_Sync] AS [SH] WITH(nolock) where 1 = 1 and [SH].[rowstatus] < 0 and [SH].runid = '%runid%'
order by [SH].sysmodified desc
step.contentbody:
Geachte lezer,

Voor de onderstaande verkooporders zijn  geen gerelateerde inkooporders gevonden. De inkooporders zullen nog moeten worden aangemaakt:







purchase_ordernrsales_ordernrmessagesyscreated
%purchase_ordernr%%sales_ordernr%%message%%syscreated%
 



Met vriendelijke groet,

De ABEI mailer

Basis gegevens:
RunID: %runid%
Tijd: %abei_now_121%
Server: %abeiserver% \ %jobid% \ %jobstepid%
